--- In gladiator@y..., Tom Ricket <tricket@y...> wrote:
> For sorting -- the game won't care .. once the objects are imported, 
they
> get placed into several distinct lists (one for living objects, one 
for
> weapons, one for other interactive objects, etc.) anyway, so it 
should
> basically neither help nor hurt for that information to be sorted 
different
> :)
> 
> --Tom

Good.  The only reason for sorting the information was making it 
easier to read/edit the text version of the grid file.
